side_panel_note: Right-click on the extension icon in the browser toolbar and select "Open side panel". This will allow you to navigate through different tabs and websites while keeping your BlockBird always visible.
setup_blockbird: Click here to set up your BlockBird
updates: Visit our changelog to see the most recent updates.
wallet_maintenance_buttons: Wallet maintenance buttons are now icons.
drag_drop_wallet_order: Added drag-n-drop to arrange wallet order.
csv_import_export_wallets: Added CSV import and export of wallets.
navigation_menu_icons: Navigation menu items are now icons.
moved_default_page_selecting: Moved default page selecting to settings page.
dark_mode_theme_added: Added a dark mode theme and added dark mode selector to settings page.
solana_tokens_added: Solana Tokens: Added the 'Tokens' page to see 5 most recently added Solana tokens verified and listed by Jupiter Exchange.
default_page_selector_added: Added default page selector to each page.
wallets_added: Wallets: Added the 'Wallets' feature. This can be used to store your wallet addresses for quick copy to paste.
styles_adjusted: Adjusted styles and colors to fit our brand more closely.
scanner_added: Scanner: Scans the current webpage for the keywords 'airdrop', 'points', and 'rewards', then displays the count of occurrences and highlights each occurrence on the webpage.
explorer_added: Explorer: Provides a searchable list of blockchains with direct links to their respective block explorers.
current_languages_001: Languages: Filipino, Hindi, Hausa, Mandarin, Portuguese, Russian, Spanish, Thai, Ukrainian, Urdu, Vietnamese
scanner_description: Scan the page for signs of an airdrop or points system
our_scan_found_no_signs: Error scanning the page. This type of webpage is not able to be scanned.
error_scanning_page: Error scanning the page. This type of webpage is not able to be scanned.
explore_description: A searchable list of blockchain explorers
wallets_description: Manage your crypto wallets for easy copy/paste
label: Label
recent_tokens: Five newest Solana tokens verified by Jupiter
token_info: Token: Ten newest Solana tokens verified by Jupiter are loaded. Use the search to find other Solana tokens.
lst_info: LST: All LSTs (Liquid Staking Tokens) listed by Sanctum.
